info.title: LeadMagic API
info.description:
A clean, consistent, and well-documented API to access LeadMagic's services, including email finding, validation, company and professional profile enrichment, and advertisement searching.

**Important**: All API endpoints use snake_case for field names in both requests and responses.
info.summary: Complete API for LeadMagic data enrichment services

apiKey.name: X-API-Key
apiKey.description: API key for authentication. Get your API key from your LeadMagic dashboard.

DetailedCompany.description: Detailed company information from company search

examples: LeadMagic tells you who is interested in your products or services. Engage them and build more pipeline, win more deals
LeadMagic tells you exactly what businesses are on your website and helps you enrich your contact and company data.
Chair, Gates Foundation and Founder, Breakthrough Energy
Chair of the Gates Foundation. Founder of Breakthrough Energy. Co-founder of Microsoft. Voracious reader. Avid traveler. Active blogger.

content.description: HTML content or JavaScript URL for the ad

examples: API key is missing or invalid.

post.description: Check the number of available credits for the authenticated user.
Validate an email address for deliverability and retrieve associated company information.
Finds a verified email address based on a person's name and company.

company_name.description: The company's name (used if domain is unknown).

post.description:
Provide a B2B profile URL (e.g., LinkedIn) to get full profile details. 
Rate limit: 300 requests/minute.

profile_url.description: Full URL of the B2B profile.

post.description: Search for company details using its domain, name, or profile URL.

schema.description: Provide at least one of the following to find company details.
